name: openapi-doc
description: Programmatically builds an Open API (Swagger 2.0) document as an Express endpoint so that the documentation and source can live together in one place. It is like annotating an Express endpoint. Later, the API can be bound to Express.

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:dev
scripts.build:dev: npm run build:lint && npm run test && npm run build:readme
scripts.build:readme: node-readme && shx mv README.md README.hbs && jsdoc2md --template README.hbs src/index.js > README.md && shx rm -rf README.hbs
scripts.check:dependencies: npm run check:used && npm run check:unused
